price: 1. Datgene wat in de hemelen is en op aarde verheerlijkt Allah, en Hij is de Almachtige, de Alwijze.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
